price: “Mmom medeε, Onyankopͻn ne me Wura; na memfa biribiara mmata me Wura Nyankopͻn ho .“
arabic: لَّٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lākinnā huwa al-lahu rabbī walā ush'riku birabbī aḥadan
